entries.title: SEC charges two Bankman-Fried colleagues with fraud
entries.description: Caroline Ellison and Gary Wang helped the former crypto CEO mislead FTX investors and customers, the SEC alleges.

entries.title: Bankman-Fried set to return to U.S. from Bahamas to face charges
entries.description: The former CEO of the crypto exchange FTX is expected to be arraigned soon in federal court in Manhattan.

entries.title: After 35 years of Final Fantasy, what’s next for composer Nobuo Uematsu?
entries.description: After taking a leave of absence from the music scene, the famous video game composer's schedule is back to being busier than ever.

entries.title: Quitting something in 2023? These apps can help.
entries.description: Help Desk examined 11 popular habit tracking and sobriety apps for cost, privacy and how easy they are to use.

entries.title: Five things to know about nuclear fusion and if it can power your home
entries.description: Nuclear fusion scientists achieved a holy grail moment last week, but it’s a long road ahead.

entries.title: Lionel Messi’s World Cup win becomes most liked Instagram post ever
entries.description: Messi's post celebrating Argentina's World Cup win racked up almost 70 million likes — beating a photo of an egg to become the most-liked ever on Instagram.
